sense.gloss: doing something dangerous, playing with fire
playing around (with someone), flirting, having an affair

sdata.j: その↑子↑↓こ↓はライターで|↑火遊↑↓ひあそ↓び|をしていた。
sdata.e: He was playing with a lighter.

sdata.j: その↑火事↑↓かじ↓は↑子供↑↓こども↓のマッチでの|↑火遊↑↓ひあそ↓び|が↑原因↑↓げんいん↓で↑起↑↓お↓こった。
sdata.e: The fire was brought about by children's playing with matches.

sdata.j: |↑火遊↑↓ひあそ↓び|は↑危↑↓あぶ↓ないよ。
sdata.e: It's dangerous to play with fire.

sdata.j: |↑火遊↑↓ひあそ↓び|は↑危↑↓あぶ↓ないよ。
トムは|↑火遊↑↓ひあそ↓び|が↑好↑↓す↓きなのよ。
|↑火遊↑↓ひあそ↓び|してたら、↑火傷↑↓やけど↓するよ。
sdata.e: If you keep playing with fire, expect to get burned.
